D

drawClockFace(Graphics) - Method in class watchface.ClockGui3
Draw the clock face and calls numberclock() that is used to put the cyan markers on the watchface.
drawHands(Graphics, double, double, double, Color, Color, Color) - Method in class watchface.ClockGui3
Draws the hour, minutes and seconds vectors, with its respective colors, using drawLine graphics method.
drawnum(Graphics, float, int) - Method in class watchface.ClockGui3
Used to fill the screen with the cyan markers representing hours.
drawNumberClock(Graphics) - Method in class watchface.ClockGui3
Draws the clock numbers (1,2,..,12).
drawPoly(Graphics, int[], int[], int) - Method in class watchface.ClockGui3
Draws a Polygon with four points (x,y) coordinates and fills it with the last color selected.
drawPoly2(Graphics, int, int, int[], int[], double, Color) - Method in class watchface.ClockGui3
Builds a polygon with a new rotation angle using buildPolygon() and draws it.
drawRadius(Graphics, int, int, double, int, int, Color) - Method in class watchface.ClockGui3
Used as an auxiliary method to help calibrating the clock screen
